featured.text: Fax resume and work samples, if any, to The China Post at (03) 2595-7962.
To ______ the new product, the company offered some free samples before they officially launched it.
He then coated the glue on a paper sample and found that it was not only a good bookmark, but it was great for writing notes.
The results of this survey are not reliable because the people it questioned were not a typical or _____ sample of the entire population that was studied.

definition.en_def: A small part or quantity intended to show what the whole is like.
definition.example: The scientist collected a sample of water for testing.
